name: Virtual Machines & Compute Services
description: Virtualization and compute services are fundamental to cloud engineering, enabling scalable and flexible infrastructure. In this topic, you will focus on deploying virtual machines on various cloud providers (such as AWS, Azure, and GCP).

learning_steps.title: What are Compute Services?
learning_steps.description: Learn the fundamentals of cloud compute - the on-demand delivery of computing power that forms the foundation of cloud infrastructure.

learning_steps.title: Understanding Virtualization
learning_steps.description: Understand how virtualization technology enables running multiple virtual machines on a single physical server, enabling cloud scalability.

Learn to choose the right VM specs (CPU, RAM, storage) based on workload requirements. Different instance types are optimized for:

• General purpose - balanced compute, memory, networking
• Compute optimized - CPU-intensive workloads
• Memory optimized - large datasets in memory
• Storage optimized - high sequential read/write

learning_steps.text: Hands-on: Deploy a VM using default configuration
learning_steps.description: Deploy a Virtual Machine on any cloud provider using the default configuration. Don't worry about custom networking or security groups yet - just get comfortable with the deployment process and verify your VM is running and accessible.
